A production could contains other production definitions inside it, when some part of the code makes use of this, its definitions are pasted too.

====These definitions:====
<code language="js">
p1
{
 p2{v2}
}
 
result
{
 p1
}
</code>
====Create this result:====
<code language="js">
p1
{
 p2{v2}
}
result
{
 p2{v2}
}
</code>
